<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns a reference to a group of FMA3 opcodes to where the given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p Opcode is included. If the given \\p Opcode is not recognized as FMA3</Highlight></CodeLine>
